programme.title: Magic of Zion
programme.desc: Experience the magnificent Zion National Park in its autumn splendor! Brilliant autumn colors combine with the warm red tones of Zions dramatic cliffs to create a visual feast like no other in" Magic of Zion". Also included is rare footage of the endangered American Condor, the largest flying land bird in North America. Watch as a wild parent Condor feeds and nurtures its fledgling on the cliffs of Zion, an awe inspiring sight since there used to be only 50 condors in existence. Available now to subscribers of NatureStream.tv. Runtime 82 minutes.

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Drake Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E16 Drake went from hip hop hero to deadbeat dad when Kanye West collaborator Pusha T revealed Drake was hiding a secret son, but why was he hiding his son in the first place? And how did Pusha know about it?Everybody assumed Kanye had leaked the information because he was threatened by Drake’s success, but the truth is way more complicated.After digging into Drake and Kanye’s feud and friendship, our team discovered the real story behind Drake’s secret son and the journey he went on to embrace fatherhood for himself.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: Curtis Martin Running Towards Success
programme.desc: Legendary NFL Player Curtis Martin enjoyed great success playing for the New England Patriots and the New York Jets. After retiring, he was inducted to the Pro Football Hall of Fame…. yet he openly admits that he really didn’t want to play football and that he was forced into it. What dark trauma from his childhood almost kept him from realizing his true dream and the greatest opportunity of his life?

programme.title: Christine Ha: Courage in the Kitchen
programme.desc: In this exclusive Goalcast Original, the first blind contestant and winner of MasterChef, Christine Ha, opens up about how she lost her sight and her mother at a young age. These formative experiences shaped who she is today and pushed her to never give up on her dreams and finding ways to connect with the spirit of her mother.

programme.title: Zion Clark No Excuses
programme.desc: Born with no legs, moving from foster home to foster home - where he was often abused - Zion’s life changed when he was adopted by Kimberli. From that point on, he was able to focus on his wrestling career and become a true champion, overcoming his physical differences.

programme.title: Cynthia Vigil: Escaping The Toy-Box Killer
programme.desc: March 20th, 1999, Cynthia meets up with her friend, never expecting she is minutes away from being abducted. When she wakes up, a chilling voice speaks to her – its coming from a recording. As her tears dry up, the early memories of her tough childhood revive, and a voice in her heart tells her: escape.

programme.title: Aron Ralston The True Story Behind 127 Hours.
programme.desc: Pinned down by a rock in a desert canyon miles away from civilization, Aron Ralston spent days trapped, thinking he was going to die. But something happened that changed his outlook and gave him the determination to fight for his life.

programme.title: Jonny Kim Launched into Adulthood
programme.desc: Jonny Kim changed careers three times before he even turned 40! Who would believe that this highly decorated Navy SEAL, doctor, and NASA astronaut would be hiding a tragic secret about his past? In the end, what his colleagues have to say about him will bring you to tears.

programme.title: GSP Behind The Mask
programme.desc: As a child, Georges St-Pierre was bullied relentlessly by an older and much bigger boy at his school. He was tortured, and humiliated on a daily basis, leading to years of built up anger and frustration. It was this traumatizing childhood experience that led him to study martial arts and become one of the most celebrated UFC Champions in the world. Years later, Georges faced his childhood bully once again. What he chose to do in that moment is nothing short of amazing.

programme.title: Katelyn Ohashi For The Perfect 10
programme.desc: Top USA gymnast Katelyn Ohashi was the best gymnast in the world, until she became the target of relentless body shaming from her coach and social media. The elite gymnastics industry is notorious for body shaming, and when coach Valorie Kondos took over at UCLA, Katelyn rebelled against the stereotypes and her revenge went viral.

programme.title: Scott Smiley Fighting for Life - A Soldier s Comeback
programme.desc: US Army Officer Scott Smiley was on a mission to protect his country when he accidentally became the victim of a shocking suicide bombing. What he does next is nothing short of a miracle.

programme.title: Aim for the Skies
programme.desc: Busy and uptight mother wishes her kid would just grow up. But when her science-loving son sets off a rocket ship inside the house, she completely loses it. Will this strict mom break her little boy’s dreams?

programme.title: 5 Important Social Security Rules Most Americans Don t Know
programme.desc: Today, Marvin Musick from Medicare School looks into the often-overlooked aspects of Social Security that can make a big difference in your retirement planning. Youll learn about the critical role of your full retirement age, how your current income affects your Social Security taxes, and strategies to maximize your benefits. Marvin believes in making financial planning accessible to everyone, so he breaks down every detail so that you can make better decisions about your financial future. Tune in to gain the knowledge you need about Social Security as you turn 65!

programme.title: Every 65 Year Old Needs To Watch Medicare Social Security Retirement Planning
programme.desc: Marvin Musick from Medicare School offers essential insights for those nearing 65, focusing on Medicare, Social Security, and retirement planning. He outlines who needs to enroll in Medicare at 65, covering key groups such as retirees, COBRA insurance holders, military retirees, individuals with Affordable Care Act plans, and small business employees. This video is ideal for anyone close to retirement age looking for guidance on these critical decisions.

The Hidden Danger of Relying on Traditional Retirement Planning

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Rolex Monterey Motorsport Reunion
programme.desc: Celebrate racing history at Laguna Seca as legendary machines from every era roar back to life. Vintage icons, classic rivalries, and pure motorsport passion come together for one unforgettable weekend.

programme.title: Super Hero Projects
programme.desc: Adding super details raises us from good to super! Angela Wolf begins with the next lesson in our A line skirt and adds suede cutouts for a brand new look. Then it's a shirt you can complete in an evening with unique pull up sleeves for fashion and cosplay versatility with Cheryl Sleboda.

programme.title: Off Our Needles
programme.desc: Hold onto your needles! Tracie and Jodi, are here to dish out fresh fiber inspiration. From project picks to wooly good gossip, things are about to get super knitty… and maybe just a little nutty.

programme.title: Wear It!
programme.desc: With friends and family, create and wear your crafting projects. A fashionable, shimmery clay bird necklace is perfect to wear or to give as a gift. Franz shows how to draw original designs and transfer them to your t-shirt. Jenny uses plastic tableware and fabric dye to make a stenciled flower or flag on a t-shirt. Katie weaves a colorful loop bracelet you can make in your favorite colors or school colors. Use the Family Craft box to transform a t-shirt into a superhero cape with a custom-designed logo.

programme.title: Me!
programme.desc: Let's turn toward ourselves for creative ideas. When she makes a lighted mirror, Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes you a star. Katie Hacker makes personal paper dolls and Franz Spohn draws a 3D self-portrait. Jenny celebrates Thanksgiving with Pilgrim-style table decorations.

programme.title: Color Explorations
programme.desc: Create custom colors and add a new twist to traditional techniques. Katie Hacker combines metals with stones and beads to make her style statement. Artist syndee holt blends polymer clay to create new colors and contemporary designs using the ancient art of mokume gane. Designer Jill MacKay shares a great die-cutting tip as she embellishes leather to make dangly earrings.

programme.title: Color Inspirations
programme.desc: Jump-start your creative ideas. Krystal Wick and Cynthia Kimura blend beads, stones and pearls in endless combinations to make bracelets, necklaces and earrings. In her Beading Lesson, Katie uses knotted cords and beads to create great bracelets in minutes.

programme.title: Episode 6: DIY Embellishments
programme.desc: Renovate the surface of your pages. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer adds depth to her designs with amazing shrinking embellishments. May Flaum creates dynamic designs with misty effects using scraps. Ashley Horton has a tip for storing tiny letters and embellishments. Cheryl Boglioli makes 3-D designs with fringed fabric and felt.

programme.title: Episode 3: Nature's Elements
programme.desc: Nature's elements include those that are growing and those that result from being exposed to nature. Host Julie Fei Fan Balzer begins with paint blob flowers, a fun and easy way to create flowers with a minimum of drawing. Then Alexandra Stapleton creates a card using a stamped, cut out of a floral image. Seth Apter creates a rust monoprint; the weathered look shows the effects of nature. Finally, Tori Weyers has lesson 2 and left handed flowers. Use your non dominant hand and watercolors to expand your sketchbook.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Bad Mood, First Kiss & Ex-Flamed
programme.desc: Alvin comes home from work and finds Elizabeth in a foul mood. Elizabeth and Alvin recall their hesitant first kiss. Alvin becomes jealous when Elizabeth invites an old beau to dinner. (1953).

programme.title: H20 X5 Steam Wet Mop
programme.desc: This powerful steam mop is your best friend for a cleaner home, without using harsh chemicals. With the H2O X5, cleaning is easy and effective on all surfaces.

programme.title: Main Street USA
programme.desc: Mr. Mooney and Lucy travel to a small town to loan the mayor money to build a highway down Main Street. When they arrive, they are greeted with intense opposition and Lucy decides to join the anti-highway fight. Original Air Date: Jan. 23, 1967.

programme.title: Nectar Pillows
programme.desc: Reach peak comfort, help reduce neck pain with patented ComforZip? technology. 3 levels of support?soft, medium, or firm. Fresh, premium memory foam clusters provide pressure relief, while the cooling cover wicks away heat and boosts breathability.

programme.title: Lucy, The Fight Manager
programme.desc: Lucy encourages a washed-up boxer to come out of retirement for one match to earn enough money to open a flower shop. Original Broadcast Date: 2/20/1967.

programme.desc: A charity and veterans service organization that offers a variety of programs, services and events for wounded veterans of the military.

programme.desc: An elderly widower is missing, so Friday and Smith retrace his actions before his disappearance. The evidence points to a long vacation until the story told by Mrs. Banner, who rented the man's house, does not add up. Original Air Date: 5/14/1953.

programme.title: EXECUTION
programme.desc: Ten years after a tragic childhood attack, that took his first and only love, a man awakens from a coma and begins killing everything in his path. Seemingly random murders begin to unfold into a mysterious story of revelation, intrigue and redemption. Execution is an eclectic blend of Comedy, Horror and Romance.

programme.title: HANGMAN
programme.desc: Two Iraq war vets Nick and Lenny return to the hometown of their ex girlfriends to see if they can rekindle the flames. What should be a little R&R in the woods slowly turns into Murder & Mayhem, when they take off with the girls to an abandoned cabin on their closed Alma Mater campus. There they fall prey to a deadly game of Hangman. This one comes complete with a real noose for the losers. Lust soon gives way to suspicion and fear as they turn on each other to survive. Only the Hangman knows who will win this game

programme.title: FUNNY LITTLE CARS 1 ADVENTURES IN THE LITTLE OAZA

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 8

Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: GREASE IS THE WORD
programme.desc: Durian Grey revives the dark art of Chumpling generation while Ralph struggles with feelings of intellectual inadequacy

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: CAKE PE CHAI
programme.desc: Its Poodles birthday today and Sundar has planned to prepare the perfect cake for poodle Aaloo Paratha Cake with Chai Frosting but he has to do this while he is also taking care of the Hotel Californias demanding customers. And Chai Raja should not find this out. Ingredients are in place, Sundar is ready to bake and Basha is also ready with a surprise for sundar which is making sure that the cake is never baked. Will the cake be baked?

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: While dusting the house store room Dunky finds an old chest containing a treasure map. He is all thrilled. Keet and Cat also join in and are equally thrilled to find the treasure.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornPromi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: CAN I KEEP HER PLEASE?
programme.desc: Buzz finds a strange seed and tenderly nurtures it. The seed sprouts and blossoms into a healthy, baby plant he names Ruby. As Ruby grows, she eats more and more healthy food and becomes very large and aggressive towards the other Creepy Candy TM. Ty-Poe suggests that Ruby be moved to a different environment out in nature. Will Buzz let her go, will she go peacefully, will the other Creepy CandyTM be eaten? Watch the funny and action packed episode to find out what happens.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornValeo
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Ene
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: A poor but loving couple secretly sells their most precious things to spend a happy Christmas and buys gifts for each of them.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: Moles' Wedding
programme.desc: The Mole couple want their daughter to have the above-ground life with sunlight unlike themselves. Therefore, the couple go on a journey to find the husband who will have a joyful life with their daughter above the ground.

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: No rain, no gain
programme.desc: The twins meet Imelda, a very anxious lizard. Because she can see a small cloud in the blue sky, Imelda is preparing to face a hurricane. Perhaps you can think positive and consider that a bit of rain is good for someone else.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org.

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: Tika Pila Thriller
programme.desc: Bella the mouse is trying hard to balance a huge pile of books just when Mewmew zooms by making Bella trip on a pebble. So she continues walking forward in reverse mode. She is so engrossed in her new walking mode that she bumps into Deedee making her books fall all over the place. On Deedee’s query as to what new learning Bella was into, they start discussing about Tika Pila and their joined curiosity to know more about the secretive creature by asking everybody in Abra-Dabra what they know about Tika Pila. Charlie seems to know a little, but the Doobydoos are too scared to even speak about her. But Bella is determined to know all she can about Tika Pila and sets off all geared for the expedition. She is scared out of her wits by the sudden and loud hooting of Tika Pila she runs for her life and slips to a halt right in front of Deedee and Nino. Almost when Bella is about to give up her Tika Pila discovery project, Deedee encourages her by helping Bella with some magic. Deedee casts a spell to help Bella get close enough to study Tika Pila. Strengthened by the spell, Bella gives one more try. Deedee and friends soon spot Tika Pila at town-hall. But as they admire how wonderful Tika Pila looks as she eats cacti flowers they hear her hoot very differently. Bella opines that the hoots are successively different because Tika Pila wants to go back home. Just then the Doodbydoos pass by and Tika Pila follows them. Deedee comes up with a plan to lure Tika Pila back to her home by getting the Doobydoos to follow Mayor De Pfeffle holding out a plate stacked with their favourite custard sandwiches. Deedee and Bella lay cacti flowers as well for Tika Pila to follow. On seeing the wide open cacti fields Tika Pila gives a loud and happy toot and makes a run for it. Bella is so happy that she decides that something as wonderful, mystical and magical as Tika Pila shouldn’t be studied.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: Where’s Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: Weather Boy
programme.desc: Rain keeps Fred and his buddies stuck inside, until Friday secretly clears the rain clouds, earning Fred the name, “Weather boy.” Brains warns Fred never to try that again, though Nora begs him to make her beach party have a sunny day. Fred’s tinkering attracts a strange gas cloud, which they must freeze, causing snow on the beach.

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: The Wise Goat of Baghdad
programme.desc: Jamillah brings a pair of walkie talkies to Baghdad. Aladdin loses one in a goat pen and soon the people of Baghdad have gathered to hear the amazing talking goat. Aladdin and Jamillah have fun playing this prank until the Sultan is called to see the amazing sight and the goat breaks one of the walkie talkies. The goat refuses to speak to the Grand Vizier and, feeling foolish, he blames Jamillah for humiliating him. Aladdin calls Genie who saves the day by morphing into the goat and biting the Grand Viziers bottom.

programme.title: Hello Pinkar!
programme.desc: Dada, an explorer, and his amazing Pinkar camping car crash in the Unknown Forest. He soon meets Bubbles, the forgetful fish, Caber, the know-it-all beaver, and Doubt, the happy mole. The sudden arrival of Dada and Pinkar ruins the presentation of Scottie Buddys new invention. So Scot, the self-proclaimed "greatest inventor of the Unknown Forest" and Piggy and Puggy, the crazy owl brothers, go to find out what has happened. As soon as Scot sets his eyes on Pinkar, its love at first sight. He decides he should have it for himself. He suggests having a race, Pinkar against Scottie Buddy, and the winner gets a wish. Motivated to win, Scot ends up going too fast, but when he tries to slow down he realizes he forgot to brake his invention. What will happen to Scot and who will win?

programme.title: The Ride Of Their Lifes
programme.desc: Fred and Sir Percival get taken for the ride of their lives when evil aliens disguise their space ship as an amusement park ride. Sir Percival thinks it’s an intense ride, but Fred realizes—it’s real! Agent Brains saves the day.

programme.title: The Supreme Law – Simbad
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf Fo, travel into the story of Sinbad the Sailor, having been called out by PRINCESS ARIBA, the daughter of the GRAND CALIPH. There, they learn that the intrepid sailor has been arrested by the VIZIER, accused of having broken a supreme law: lying to the Grand Caliph, when recounted the stories of his incredible voyages to him. Unless someone does something, SINBAD will be executed in 12 hours’ time. SANDRA and FO must find irrefutable proof that the wonders described by SINBAD are true, while at the same time escaping from the claws of the evil VIZIER.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls "bigness" that helps save the day.

programme.title: Smightycorns
programme.desc: Melody and the magical Smightycorns perform at a festival, while the Villains try to ruin the day by disguising themselves as one. When Sneevil and Biggs get their hands on the Air Stone, a winding chase ensues through the Magic Region.

programme.title: Monkey Business
programme.desc: Don’s food supplies are getting stolen and he blames the rats. Now it seems there is a new thief around. And it is a monkey from the courtyard tree. And the monkey is definitely smarter and messier than the dogs and the rats put together. But, at last when they are about to catch the monkey, the storey takes an unexpected turn…….

programme.title: Friendfest Festival
programme.desc: Friendfest is about to be ruined when the Smighties get the Switcherozee Surprise from the Villains and switch personalities. They get the ultimate lesson in friendship when theyl learn to appreciate each other and defeat Sneevil and Biggs.

programme.title: Ah~ It's so cold
programme.desc: Its winter in the Unknown Forest. Duda wakes up and sees icicles for the first time and thinks they are crystal treasure. On the other side of the forest, Scot is hatching another plan to kidnap Pinkar for himself. This time he needs to dig a long tunnel, so he convinces Duda to make one for him if he loses an ice skating contest. With Dada, Bubble and Caber as judges, Scot and Duda begin their skating routines. To everyones surprise, however, Duda performs exceptionally well on the ice, spurring Scot to go further. Ultimately, Scots reckless behavior literally puts him on thin ice. Dada and the others try in every way to help him... but will they succeed?

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: An Unforgettable Journey - 3 Little Pigs Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the world of fairytales, having been called out by the THREE BEARS. They ask the detective to investigate a fraudulent lottery. They have bought loads of packets of detergent in the hope of winning a cruise, which was the prize in the lottery. But the prize has gone to the 7 LITTLE GOATS and the 3 PIGS, who had only bought one packet each. SANDRA and FO will very soon discover that the whole think is a trap laid by the WOLF to devour the LITTLE GOATS and the PIGS.

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: Ilusión
programme.desc: Olga e Ígor quieren casarse. Ígor tiene que irse al ejército, donde un trágico accidente cambiará sus vidas.

programme.title: Fórmula de vida
programme.desc: El edificio construido por la empresa de Anna se derrumba. ¿Cómo logrará encontrar a los verdaderos culpables?

programme.title: Fórmula de vida
programme.desc: El edificio construido por la empresa de Anna se derrumba. ¿Cómo logrará encontrar a los verdaderos culpables?

programme.title: Fórmula de vida

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: Crystal
programme.desc: Director: Adel Awad - Cast: Sherihan / Hesham Selim - Year of production: 1993

programme.title: Ala Ganb Ya Osta
programme.desc: Director: Saeid Hamed - Cast: Asraf Abd El Baki - Asr Yasein / - Year of production: 2008

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Felix Gets Broadcasted-1923
programme.desc: Felix spots a fisherman on his way to his fishing spot, and figures he can follow the guy and grab a quick lunch by stealing his catch. Although he successfully nabs a few fish, the angler catches on and finally captures Felix. To get his revenge, he sends Felix through the telephone wires ("broadcasted") to Egypt, and Felix finds out that the Egyptians don't want him there, either.

programme.title: Superman cartoons2
programme.desc: Superman cartoons2

programme.title: The Friendly Ghost 1945
programme.desc: Depressed by the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After unintentionally scaring several potential pals, Casper befriends two young children. They take him home, where Casper frightens their mother. Casper is again upset because he believes that he will always scare away his potential buddies. However, Casper scares away a banker who is coming to foreclose on the woman's house, and this wins her heart for Casper.

programme.title: Training Pigeons 1936
programme.desc: Betty Boop is training a flock of pigeons, but one stray leads Pudgy the pup on a precarious chase over the rooftops.

programme.title: Tulips Shall Grow 1942
programme.desc: A carefree boy and a young girl find their idyllic countryside invaded by an army of mindlessly destructive robots.

programme.title: Patriotic Popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye is enjoying watering his patriotic garden on July 4 when he catches his nephews attempting to light fireworks. The game is on when he attempts to confiscate the fireworks and the boys strike back with edgy pranks. Bluto and Olive Oyl do not appear in this cartoon.

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Superman: The Magnetic Telescope- 1942
programme.desc: When police interfere with a reckless scientist's experiment, it creates a deadly meteor shower only Superman can stop.

programme.title: Pudgy and the Lost Kitten 1938
programme.desc: Pudgy and the Lost Kitten

programme.title: The Crystal Brawl 1957
programme.desc: Bluto muscles out Popeye to take Olive to the fair. Popeye rushes ahead and poses as a fortune teller, luring Olive in. He shows Olive her future (actually, her past) in the crystal ball: first, a clip of a mountain climbing sequence that culminates in Bluto assaulting Olive. Then, a clip from another amusement park showing strongman Bluto stealing Olive away to a roller-coaster while Popeye rings a strength-testing bell repeatedly. Olive, having seen this, no longer wants anything to do with Bluto and walks out. Bluto exposes Popeye and chases Olive into a Tunnel of Love; Popeye follows and trashes Bluto.

programme.title: Ride Him, Bosko -1931
programme.desc: BosKo in the Wild West, tries to have fun with any situation that come in his way.

programme.title: The Return of Mr. Hook -1945
programme.desc: Seaman Hook has big plans for after the war, mostly involving rushing home and marrying his sweetie. So do his fellow seaman, but theirs involve buying bond

programme.title: Boom Boom-1936
programme.desc: World War I, apparently. There is a series of quick blackout gags, including a soldier that throws the pin, is blown sky-high by the grenade, and is caught in a net by an ambulance driver; one soldier's encounters with very smart bullets; a machine gunner with the jitters. Porky leads a charge, but with no support from his company, he runs back and dives under Beans' bunk. After a quick chorus of "You're in the Army Now," a messenger pigeon drops in with news that General Hardtack is being held prisoner. They dash off in a motorcycle/sidecar, chased by another smart bullet, and arrive in the nick of time to dispatch the general's captors. They fly off in a plane and get shot down to end up together in the hospital.

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Goo Goo Goliath 1954
programme.desc: An inebriated stork must deliver a baby to a giant at the top of a beanstalk, but doesn't feel like flying that high and instead delivers the baby to a normal-sized couple, who try to raise the giant tot as their own.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: The Underground World-1943
programme.desc: Lois Lane and an explorer set out on an expedition through an underground cavern and discover a race of hawk-men. When these creatures prepare a ritual sacrifice for the adventurous pair, Superman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Popeye for President
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are running for president; it's election day, the vote is tied, and Olive is the only remaining voter

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Hard Luck -1921
programme.desc: Strange things ensue after a young man attempts to take his own life.

programme.title: The Fatal Mallet-1914
programme.desc: Three man will fight for the love of a charming girl. Charlie will play dirty, throwing bricks to his contender, and using a huge hammer to hurt one of them. But a precocious kid will be the fourth suitor in discord.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show: Season 3; Episode 21; Opie and the Spoiled Kid
programme.desc: Opie's friend Arnold seems to have it all--a new bike, fat allowance, and plenty of leisure time. When the pressure's on, though, Opie learns that these assets are actually Arnold's greatest weakness.

programme.title: The Haunted House 1921
programme.desc: A bank clerk ends up in a seemingly haunted house that is actually a thieves' hideout.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Program; Season 3;Episode 3; Jack Gets Robbed
programme.desc: Jack is pestered by a young autograph seeker, then Bob Crosby sings a medley of songs from "Peter Pan" to the child. After the show, Jack has trouble getting to sleep because of a leaky faucet and forces Rochester to rock his bed. Finally asleep, a pair of burglars try to ransack Jack's bedroom but are defeated by his booby traps.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 32;The Big House
programme.desc: When the Mayberry jail is called upon to lodge two hold-up men captured by the state police, Barney finds himself with more than he can handle - especially when "assisted" by ad-hoc deputy Gomer.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962: Season 2; Episode 5; Hustling the Hustler
programme.desc: Rob doesn't know what he's in for when he invites Buddy's charming, pool hustling brother Blackie over for dinner and a friendly game of billiards.

programme.title: Parlor, Bedroom and Bath-1931
programme.desc: A man tries passing off a socially awkward fellow as a Casanova in the hopes of marrying off his would be sister-in-law.

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: Broadway partners Vicky Lane and Dan Christy have a tiff over Christy's womanizing. Jealous Vicky takes up with her old flame and former dance partner, Victor Price, and Dan's career takes a nosedive. In hopes of rekindling their romance and getting Vicky back on the boards with him, Dan follows her to a ritzy resort in the Canadian Rockies, where she and Victor are about to open their new act. But things get complicated when Dan wakes after a bender to find that he's hired an outlandish Latin secretary, Rosita Murphy, which makes Vicky think he's just up to his old tricks again

programme.title: The Miracle on 34th Street 1955
programme.desc: In The Miracle on 34th Street, a kindly old man hired to play Santa Claus at Macy’s insists that he is the real Kris Kringle. As his warmth and generosity touch everyone around him, skeptics take him to court to prove his claim. Blending holiday charm, heartfelt performances, and a timeless message about faith and belief, this television adaptation of the classic story reminds audiences that sometimes the greatest miracles are the ones we choose to believe in.

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem 1956
programme.desc: In The Star of Bethlehem, the timeless Nativity story is brought to life in a reverent and beautifully crafted short film. Through vivid visuals and heartfelt narration, the journey of Mary and Joseph, the shepherds in the fields, and the guiding star that led the Wise Men to Bethlehem are retold with warmth and devotion. With its simple yet powerful storytelling, this classic reminds audiences of the wonder, hope, and faith at the heart of Christmas.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood: The Christmas Goose 1957
programme.desc: In The Adventures of Robin Hood: The Christmas Goose, Richard Greene dons the green cloak once more in this holiday-themed tale of merriment and mischief. When greedy lords try to tax the people of Sherwood into hunger during the Christmas season, Robin Hood and his Merry Men hatch a clever plan involving a prize goose to bring cheer back to the poor. With daring adventure, festive spirit, and a touch of Yuletide humor, this family-friendly special blends classic Robin Hood heroics with holiday warmth.

programme.title: Don't Open Til Christmas 1984
programme.desc: In Don’t Open Till Christmas, holiday cheer turns to terror on the streets of London when a masked killer begins targeting anyone dressed as Santa Claus. As the bodies pile up, a determined detective races against time to unmask the murderer before Christmas Eve becomes a nightmare. With grisly twists, chilling suspense, and a sinister holiday atmosphere, this cult slasher proves that not every gift under the tree brings joy.

programme.title: The Great Rupert 1950
programme.desc: In The Great Rupert, holiday magic comes in the form of an unexpected hero—a clever little squirrel! When a down-on-their-luck vaudeville family moves into a new home, they discover that Rupert, a trained squirrel, has a knack for showering them with good fortune. With Jimmy Durante adding warmth and humor, this heartwarming comedy blends laughter, music, and a touch of Christmas wonder into a charming tale of hope, luck, and the unexpected ways happiness finds us.

programme.title: The Navy Way

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail 1933
programme.desc: A young John Wayne rides tall in Sagebrush Trail, a gripping tale of justice and redemption. Wrongly accused of murder, John Brant (Wayne) escapes from prison and sets out to clear his name. Along the way, he falls in with an outlaw gang and finds himself torn between the lawless life and his fight to prove his innocence. Packed with gunfights, treachery, and frontier grit, this early Wayne Western showcases the making of a legend.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger TV Show - Enter The Lone Ranger

programme.desc: An outlaw masquerades as the son of a blind man in order to find a cache of gold located in a vacated town.

programme.title: The Lone Ranger TV Show - Pete And Pedro
Robin Hood of the Pecos 1941
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars in Robin Hood of the Pecos, a stirring tale set in the turbulent days after the Civil War. When corrupt officials exploit and oppress Texas ranchers, Roy rises as a champion of the people—fighting injustice with his six-guns and his songs. With the help of Gabby Hayes and heroine Marjorie Reynolds, he takes on the villains to bring peace and fairness back to the frontier. Filled with action, music, and Roy’s trademark charm, this Western delivers justice in true outlaw-hero style.

programme.title: The World Gone Mad : Starring Pat O'Brien

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: On this episode of Cigar City Unrolled, owner of Long Ash Cigars - Mike- shows off his shop in the heart of Ybor city. Including his very own hand rolling station and aging room! Join us as we explore this unique style for a cigar lounge!

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: This episode explores Quality Importers, a comprehensive provider of cigar accessories, showcasing their diverse product lines, in-house customization services, and new "Conspiracy" cigar brand, all built on a foundation of strategic acquisitions and a passion for the cigar lifestyle.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionados Jared and Alex to review the Foundation Aksum cigar. Together, they discuss its rich flavors, smooth draw, and craftsmanship, offering their insights into what makes this cigar stand out in the crowd.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of Behind the Blend, Sean interviews Willy Marante, the national sales manager and East Coast representative for La Aurora Cigars. Willy discusses La Aurora's history as one of the oldest brands in the Dominican Republic, celebrating 122 years, and highlights key products like the newly redesigned 100 Años and the colorful Preferidos lines. He shares insights into his journey from a career in music to cigar sales, the importance of grassroots marketing for small brands, and how the cigar industry fosters a sense of community that transcends social and professional backgrounds.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Dayan from Duyos Humidors introduces the first Cuban-made cigar accessories legally imported into the U.S. in 65 years, highlighting their handcrafted humidors made from 100% cedar and other fine woods. He shares his personal connection to cigars through his grandfather's farm in Cuba and discusses the company's future plans, including customization options and collaborations.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean sits down with Lynn Hawkins of Placencia Cigars, one of the most respected names in the industry. Lynn pulls back the curtain on Placencia's extensive history as a leading grower and producer, sharing insights into their meticulous tobacco cultivation, the intricate art of their cigar manufacturing process, and what makes their family's legacy truly stand out in the world of premium cigars.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by Dr. Anthony Grant, owner of The Cigar Quarters, to review the Perdomo Lot cigar. Together, they explore its bold flavors, construction, and overall smoking experience, giving their expert takes on this standout stick.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this "Behind the Blend" episode, Belkys Sanchez, Regional Sales Manager for Crown Heads, shares her journey in the male-dominated cigar industry, covering her territory of Florida, Georgia, and Puerto Rico. She details the history and offerings of Crown Heads and Ozgener Family Cigars, emphasizing their quality and accessible price points, and highlights the Puerto Rican market's preference for larger ring gauges. [cite_start]Sanchez concludes by reflecting on what cigars mean to her: "life, journey, history, culture, and peace," and encourages aspiring sales managers to follow their passions.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join us as we take a behind the scenes tour of Florida's largest independent tobacco farm. Jeff Borysiewicz guides us through his tobacco farm, sharing tricks of the trade and everything that goes into the process of producing high quality cigar tobacco.

programme.title: Trophy Pintails in Oregon
programme.desc: Mario and the local Oregon guys get together for a late season hunt in the Pacific NW. They pull out the layout boats for some high-water tricks to shoot some trophy Pintails and other ducks.

programme.title: Cold Weather Ducks
programme.desc: Mario heads east to a few different states and ends up in Wyoming at the Weatherby Facility for a tour. To cap things off we get to head out on the river for a very cold and snowy mallard hunt, with a small side of honkers to enjoy.

programme.title: Wild West Ducks & Nebraska Snows
programme.desc: The FA crew heads out on the famed Columbia River in Oregon to chase some birds, miles of places for the birds to hide and some incredible scenery. Then we slide into a little trip we took to Nebraska to hunt with the guys at Whiskey Sloughs.

programme.title: Mom's Bear
programme.desc: Corey and his parents go bear hunting in the North Woods. It's moms first time chasing black bear.

programme.title: Meet the Bennettes on their Multi-Species South Dakota Line
programme.desc: Tune in for plenty of excitement as Matt and Nancy Bennette run their trapline. Matt is an old pro, while Nancy is new to the craft. Nancys anticipation and excitement is palpable as she wears her emotions on her sleeve

programme.title: Sweetgrass First Nation - Part 1
programme.desc: Join Shawna as she heads to Saskatchewan to hunt Sweetgrass First Nation with Lance owner of Battle River Cree Outdoors. (Part 1 of 3)

programme.title: PK Lures Walleye Fishing
programme.desc: We do a little bait testing with Curt Reeff, owner of PK lures. First we fish on the Missouri River then we head north to Manitoba, where Bryan Bogdan and Kurt test out some of the same baits and color combinations on Northern Manitoba walleyes

programme.title: Fiesta de AMÉRICA TV con Pamela David y Ángel de Brito + Relaciones tóxicas | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 30/11/24:
- La fiesta de #AméricaTV en #Miami por los premiados en los #MartínFierro Latinos: Lucía Ugarte celebró junto a Claudia Albertario por #ArgentinosEnMiami y habló con #PamelaDavid y #AngelDeBrito, también ganadores de la noche por Desayuno Americano y #LAM. - Evento de #Profhilo Structura: Potenciá tu belleza natural con lo último en medicina estética para lograr realzar la estructura natural de la piel. - Hablamos con la psicóloga Laura Amicone sobre cómo reconocer una relación tóxica en la pareja. - #YoJefa: conocemos a Vanesa Ruas, la dermatocosmiatra que logra un brillo único en la piel, y nos cuenta los detalles de sus mejores tratamientos faciales.

programme.title: Desayuno y desfile Revista Aló + Hairssime + Colombia Moda 2024 + Estética | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Lucía Ugarte desde el Desayuno de Mujeres Aló @AloRevista. - @HairssimeProfesional lanzó su colección Iconos de Nusense Lumine: hablamos con Guillermina Valdéz, embajadora de la marca, Majo Martino, "Mucho Peluquería", "Guardia House", Maru Gándara, Flor Giberti y Julieta Expósito, técnicas de la marca. - Cobertura exclusiva de #colombiamoda 2024 con Kahren Rondon. - Las últimas tendencias en #dermatologiaestetica con la Dra. Luciana Fernandes.

programme.title: Benjamín Vicuña y Flor Peña en exclusivo + Neuquén Fashion Week 2024 | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Entrevista exclusiva con #florenciapeña y #benjamínvicuña en el lanzamiento de #laisladelastentaciones por #primevideo. - Cobertura exclusiva del #neuquen #fashionweek: hablamos con Verónica de la Canal y Rox nos muestra todo el back del evento y los mejores looks. - Lucía Ugarte entrevista a Sol Macaluso, la periodista argentina que hoy triunfa en Europa. - Visita a #Leblonclinique para aprender sobre lo último en #medicinaestetica.

programme.title: Balloon Museum Miami + Circuito Messi en Rosario + Atelier de Jorge Rey
programme.desc: Chicas Guapas is the first TV and online community of fashion, beauty and lifestyle with #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas. They are Latin American influencers in Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Paraguay, Costa Rica, Venezuela and the UK. In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . Chicas Guapas has more than 97 million monthly impressions. It was created and is directed by Lucía Ugarte, from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

programme.title: Guest Megan Rapinoe
programme.desc: This week we have the one, the only MEGAN RAPINOE on the podcast!!! This conversation between Nessa and Megan has been a LONG time coming and it was WORTH THE WAIT!!! They talk everything including Megan’s career, her feud with DONALD TRUMP, what it was like to score the winning goal in a World Cup championship, her and her team’s lawsuit for EQUAL PAY, and her life after professional sports. This was a REALLY fun, entertaining, and inspiring episode that you DO NOT WANT TO MISS!!

programme.title: Last Chance for Animals Wows Hollywood
programme.desc: Join stars on the red carpet for animal rights at the 2023 Last Chance for Animals gala!

programme.title: Meet 6 Vegan Sisters
programme.desc: Six vegan sisters... YES 6... and, they're great chefs showing us how to make Vegan Mac &Cheese!

programme.title: Lauren Toyota's Hot for Food - Go Nuts For Walnut Sage Pesto GnudI!
programme.desc: These gnocchi-like dumplings are filled with vegan ricotta that's creamy and delicious.

programme.title: Susan's Vegan Soy Curl Bolognese
programme.desc: Extraordinary, meaty Bolognese with all the rich flavor but no cholesterol

programme.title: Fillet King Oyster Mushroom
programme.desc: King Oyster Mushroom magic! Wicked Kitchen co-founder Derek Sarno works his magic on shrooms.

programme.title: End The Idea of Waste
programme.desc: Meet the man determined to end the idea of waste as an executive at two companies leading the way.

programme.title: Best vegan chocolate cake... in Ireland!
programme.desc: When 2 vegan rock stars visit Ireland... they learn, how to make the best vegan chocolate cake!

programme.title: Plant-Based Milk Does a Body Good
programme.desc: Cow's milk is for baby cows. Humans have healthier choices.

programme.title: Plant Based in the Burbs - Jackfruit"ChickUn" Salad
programme.desc: Sherri Sheree shows you how to turn jackfruit into scrumptious, cholesterol-free "ChickUn" Salad!

programme.title: Who Is Lady Freethinker?
programme.desc: The mysterious Lady Freethinker reveals her identify and talks to Nafsika about her unique mission.

programme.title: Climax Foods - Short Films
programme.desc: This cutting-edge company uses AI to make vegan cheese that is indistinguishable from dairy cheese.

programme.title: S4E11 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!
